254211.「いらっしゃ～い。\n 輝晶術士のレビィのチカラを ご所望かしらん？\n<bre:
Welcome. Would you like the power of
Pyromancer Rebi?
<break>

254212.「他に ご用は あったりするのかしらん？\n<break>: Is there anything else you need from me?<break>

254213.「もう ご用は ないみたいね。\n それじゃあ また 来てほしいわん。\n<en:
I guess you don't need me anymore. Well then,
I hope you'll come again.
<end>

254214.「どの装備品に 輝晶効果を\n 付けたいのかしらん？\n<break>:
Which piece of equipment do you want to put
Shine on?
<break>

254215.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>に\n 付けたい:
I want you to choose the Shine you want to put
on <%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>.
<break>

254216.「本当に この装備品に\n <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>を 付けても\n いい:
Are you sure you want to put <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>
on this piece of equipment?
<yesno 2><break>

254217.「それじゃあ 始めるわよん。\n キラリキランラ クリスタリッカ！\n 輝晶核の:
Okay then, let's get started.
Shiny, shiny crystal! Power of pyroclast,
gather!
<end>

254218.「あらん？ 素材が足りないみたいねん。\n<bw_break>:
Huh? You don't have enough materials.
<bw_break>

254220.「どの装備品の輝晶効果を 強化したいのん？\n<break>:
Which equipment's shine would you like to
enhance?
<break>

254222.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>は\n 今 輝晶Ｌ:
<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> now has
a shine level of <%dM_KISYO_LV>.

254223.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>の\n 強化は せ:
The enhancement of that
<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> has a <%dM_percent>% chance to
succeed. You still want to do it?
<yesno 2><break>

254224.「それじゃあ いくわよん。\n キラリキランラ クリスタリッカ！\n 輝晶核のチ:
Okay then, here we go.
Shiny, shiny crystal! Enhance with the power
of the Pyroclast!!
<end>

254225.「あらら～ 失敗しちゃうなんて。\n ごめんなさいねん……。\n<bw_brea:
Oops... looks like it failed. Sorry about
that...
<bw_break>

254226.「あらん？ 素材が足りないみたいねん。\n<bw_break>:
Huh? You don't have enough materials.
<bw_break>

254228.「どの装備品から 輝晶核を取りだすのかしら？\n 取りだしても 装備品は なくな:
Which piece of equipment am I taking the
Pyroclast out of? Don't worry, you won't lose
your equipment if you take it out.
<break>

254229.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>からは\n <%n:
I can get <%dM_ITEM_NUM> Pyroclasts from
<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>. Is it OK to go
back to +3 for the equipment?
<yesno 2><break>

254230.「それじゃあ いくわよん。\n キラリキランラ クリスタリッカ！\n 輝晶のチカ:
Okay then, here we go.
Shiny, shiny crystal! With the power of
pyromancy, it's back to original!
<end>

254231.「<%nM_ITEM_NUM>個の輝晶核が 取りだせたわん。\n はいっ どうぞ:
<%dM_ITEM_NUM> Pyroclast has been retrieved.
Here you go.
<bw_break>

254232.「<%sL_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいみたいね。\n 空きを作ってから 来て:
Looks like <%sL_BAG_TYPE> is full. Please come
back when you have some free space.
<bw_break>

254235.「どうぐかばんが いっぱいみたいね。\n 空きを作ってから 来てほしいわん。\n:
It looks like your item bag is full. I hope
you can make room in your bag before you come.
<bw_break>

254257.<select_se_off>\n輝晶効果の付与\n輝晶効果の強化\n輝晶核をと:
<select_se_off>
Add Shine Effect
Boost Shine Effect
Extract Coruscating Cores
Exchange Materials
Explanation
<select_end><break>

254594.「あらん。これって バリバリの新品ね？\n それだと 輝晶効果は 付けられないの:
Oh, no. This is brand new, right? I can't put
Shine on it. You have to equip it first.
<bw_break>

254595.「あら～ん？\n 輝晶効果を 付けられそうな装備品を\n なんにも 持ってないみ:
I don't seem to have any equipment to put
Shine on.
<bw_break>

254596.「あらん？ その装備品は ＋３じゃないから\n 輝晶効果は 付けられないわねん。:
Oh, no? You can't put Shine on that piece of
equipment because it's not +3.
<bw_break>

254597.「あらあら ごめんなさいね。\n その装備品は レベルが１００に満たないから\n:
Oh, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, but I can't add
Shine to that piece of equipment because its
level is less than 100.
<bw_break>

254598.「その装備品には とっくに\n 輝晶効果が 付いてるみたいよん。\n<bw_br:
It looks like the equipment already has Shine
on it.
<bw_break>

254599.「あら～ん？\n 輝晶効果が付いた装備品が\n ひとつも ないみたいねん。\n<:
I can't seem to find a single piece of
equipment with Shine on it.
<bw_break>

254600.「その装備品に 付いてる輝晶効果は\n 限界まで いっちゃってるみたいよん。\n:
The Shine on that piece of equipment seems to
be pushed to the limit.
<bw_break>

254601.「あら～ん？\n 輝晶効果が付いた装備品が\n ひとつも ないみたいねん。\n<:
I can't seem to find a single piece of
equipment with Shine on it.
<bw_break>

254624.「ごめんなさいね～。\n ロックしてる装備品からは\n 輝晶核を 取りだせないの:
I'm sorry. I can't get Pyroclast out of locked
equipment.
<end>

254626.「その装備品は ロックされてるみたいだけど\n 輝晶効果を 付けちゃっていいのか:
I'm not sure if I'm allowed to put Shine on
that piece of equipment that seems to be
locked.
<yesno 2><break>

254627.「その装備品は ロックされてるみたいだけど\n 本当に 強化しちゃっていいのかし:
It looks like that piece of equipment is
locked, but can I really go ahead and enhance
it?
<yesno 2><break>

256833.「うふっ 成功したみたいね。\n 私ったら がんばっちゃったわん。\n<bw_b:
I guess I succeeded. I did my best.
<bw_break>

257668.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>の\n 輝晶効果:
Are you sure you want to lose the
<%sL_GROW_KOUKA> effect of
<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>?<yesno 2><break>
